contents.text: Thank you for calling Pusher in San Francisco, powering real-time apps with hosted APIs and less code.
For sales and new account inquiries, press 1.
To discuss pricing and plans, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team to discuss pricing and plans.

navigationGoals: Discuss pricing and plan options for a new Pusher account
Get pricing details for Pusher plans to integrate real-time features into my veteran assistance app.
I need detailed pricing info on your hosted real-time API plans, including throughput limits and billing metrics.
Could you explain the pricing tiers and what each plan includes?
I’m comparing Pusher pricing tiers to find the best plan for integrating real-time data streams into my lab’s visualization tool.

contents.text: To schedule a live product demo, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to schedule a live product demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live product demo of Pusher’s real-time API
Schedule a live Pusher demo to evaluate its real-time API for my veterans peer-support platform.
I'd like to schedule a live demo of your real-time API integration, covering WebSocket and event push features.
I'd like to arrange a live walkthrough of your service so I can understand how it works.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of Pusher’s real-time APIs to evaluate its suitability for a collaborative physics simulation project.

contents.text: For technical support and API assistance, press 2.
If you need developer support, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our developer support specialists.

navigationGoals: Get developer support for integrating Pusher’s API
Get developer support to resolve API integration errors in my veteran resource app.
Help me troubleshoot my Pusher Node.js integration; I'm hitting authentication errors on presence channels.
I need assistance from a developer support specialist to help with my API integration.
I need developer support troubleshooting my Python implementation of Pusher channels for a research data dashboard.

contents.text: For system status and incident updates, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our system status desk.

navigationGoals: Check current system status and any active incidents
Check if there’s a system outage impacting my veteran support app’s real-time notifications.
Check the current system status and any active incidents affecting the real-time API endpoints.
I'd like to check if there are any current service interruptions or maintenance ongoing.
I’d like to get the current system status and any incident reports, as I rely on Pusher streams for my ongoing experiment.
